name: Boba-O-Matic
description:
Do you hate when customers complain about not getting their boba tea correct or on time? Well, perish no more! Introducing Boba-O-Matic, where we use intelligent AI to make the customer's boba tea and you just need to pull the switch on and off to dispense the amount they order. 

Deliver as fast as you can, and don't spill any boba tea! Don't make your customers wait either!

[ Controls ]

Toggle the switch with either Left Click,  Z, Down, SPACE, Controller A, or the classic Nokia Numpad 5

[ Creators ]

Sam Feng - Programming - @samfenggames

Jose Salas - Art - @salas_games

[ Note ]

This game was made during the Nokia 3310 Jam 3 (2021)

Nokia 3310 Font by Gizmo199
